main event: Dale Ross and a friend observed a cigar-shaped unidentified flying object emitting a bright white light over Oxford, Pennsylvania on May 5, 1956.
interesting points: The object was observed traveling at a high rate of speed and altitude,Appeared to be approximately 50 to 60 feet in length,No visible trail or exhaust was observed,The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes,The witness stated it was unlike any known aircraft or weather balloon.
sighted object: cigar-shaped object emitting a bright white light
witness description: Dale Ross and a friend engaged in farming operations
